div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1552 Arab el Mulk (anc. Paltus), Seleucis, 1940 Burial: c. 150 B.C. Contents: 28+ AR Ephesus: 13 dr. (as BMC 121 ff.) Antiochus III: 1 dr. (Ecbatana as ESM 631) Aradus: 14 dr. (yrs. 90-107) Disposition: dispersed Seyrig, RN 1964, pp. 47-50; Tr√©sors du Levant (in press)
